numbered_ace_sentences: 3. In every league except MLB, colored people are the majority of the players.
4. In every league, non-colored people are the minority of the players.
5. In every league, the percentage of colored head coaches is under 50%.
6. I wonder why the percentage of colored head coaches is under 50% in every league.
7. In MLB, colored people are not the majority of the players.
8. I wonder why MLB is the only league in which colored people are not the majority of the players.
9. This graph impacts my community positively.
10. This graph tells us that in most leagues colored people are the majority of the players.
12. This graph impacts my community negatively.
13. This graph shows that in every league colored people are not the majority of the head coaches or colored people are a low percentage of the head coaches.
14. This graph shows that colored people are mainly players.
15. This graph shows that not many colored people are head coaches.
16. The title of this graph is: Are most colored people subjective to being players and not head coaches in leagues?
